title: New Batman Game Tomorrow? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.23.19
description:
OK Beast's Blessing Adeoye Jr. joins Greg (and Barrett) to daydream about what all these Batman teases from WB Montreal mean for tomorrow's PlayStation State of Play.

Timecodes:
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
State of Play Watch-a-long tomorrow @ 12:45 p.m. PT - twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
http://www.patreon.com/ReRetroGames
Black Jack
Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:00 - Are we about to get Batman: Court of Owls?
00:17:18 Best Friend Q. - What do you want to see from the next Batman game and what do you expect? - Alex
00:24:04 - Borderlands 3 is setting all kinds of records for 2K
00:29:30 Best Friend Q. - Has the condition of Borderlands 3 (crashing, lag in menus, frame rate hitching, etc.) hurts it’s GOTY run in your opinions? - Alan
00:36:10 - Inside Xbox Tomorrow!
00:36:20 Best Friend Q. - Do you think they will give us general information here like pricing and a release date? or save the nitty gritty here with how the service will work and save the big announcements about this service for XO19? - The Nano Biologist
00:42:20 - Pokemon Go’s Best Month since 2016, RV @ GIB
00:45:00 - Video Games v Climate Change, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:47:18 Best Friend Q. -  Do you think we're going to see gaming companies speak out on their values more often in the future, or do you think that politics and video games (outside of commentary/satire in the art form) should be kept separate? - Riot Goes Woof
00:53:18 - Out today
00:54:10 -  Upstart
Reader mail   -
00:55:45 - What else will we see at tomorrows State of play? - Borzen00
00:59:00 - Squad Up: @CamachoGaming (Twitter)
01:03:00 - You‘re Wrong
This Week’s Hosts:
TUESDAY: Blessing and Xavier Woods
WEDNESDAY: Blessing and Greg
THURSDAY: Blessing and Peer
GAMESCAST: Thursday, 9/26 @ 2 p.m.
Tim, Greg, Blessing, Fran
FRIDAY: Blessing and Van Aken
